original_text: “When a man takes a wife and marries her, if then she finds no favor in his eyes because he has found some indecency in her, and he writes her a certificate of divorce and puts it in her hand and sends her out of his house, and she departs out of his house,
korean_text: 사람이 아내를 맞이하여 데려온 후에 그에게 수치되는 일이 있음을 발견하고 그를 기뻐하지 아니하면 이혼 증서를 써서 그의 손에 주고 그를 자기 집에서 내보낼 것이요

sentences.original_text: When a man takes a wife and marries her,
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 아내를 맞이하여 결혼할 때에,

sentences.original_text: if then she finds no favor in his eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그가 그녀에게 은혜를 얻지 못하고

sentences.original_text: because he has found some indecency in her,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그녀에게 무언가 부정한 것을 발견하였으므로,

sentences.original_text: and he writes her a certificate of divorce
and puts it in her hand
and sends her out of his house,
and she departs out of his house,
